title: (BUG REPORT) Massive Cassiopiea bug!
body:
Cassiopiea's Purple poison cloud, in some games goes invisible to the enemy team, i just had it in this game where i played Anivia, none of our team could see Cass's poison cloud, we could see her cast it (throwing purple stuff) but there was no cloud or AoE indicator on the ground, it was so easy to stand in without realising and be slowed/poisoned, and our Karma said that she had the same problem in the last game she played so its not just a glitch in this one game, please fix this, Cass is hard enough to lane against without her abilities being invisible, this isn't a rage we still beat her in lane and won the game but it is a major problem and i would be really annoyed if this happened to me in a ranked game. 
attached is a picture of me standing in the poison cloud and a picture of minions standing in it, in both instances we are slowed and being poisoned without any indicators, this is very contrary to Riot's view of clarity in game.

replies.body:
I can confirm this is a bug, just a few games ago I laned agaisnt a cass and it was so weird.

At least the cass was really bad :o but damn.
Wow. I better start playing Cassiopeia then XD

Still get invisible spears every so often.

Least you aren't losing 90% of your HP in one instance.
